messages.message:
Hi, team. Iâ€™m getting this error when I try to provision a sandbox.
```
[2022-08-29T21:29:38.634Z] The HorizontalPodAutoscaler "autoscaler-nb-reaper" is invalid: 

[2022-08-29T21:29:38.634Z] * spec.minReplicas: Invalid value: 0: must be greater than or equal to 1

[2022-08-29T21:29:38.634Z] * spec.maxReplicas: Invalid value: 0: must be greater than 0

[2022-08-29T21:29:38.634Z] * spec.metrics: Forbidden: must specify at least one Object or External metric to support scaling to zero replicas```
